commands.name: gems admin
usage: /gems admin add @user amount "reason" - Add GEMS to a user's balance
/gems admin remove @user amount "reason" - Remove GEMS from a user's balance
/gems admin stats - View server-wide GEMS statistics

examples.description: Award 100 GEMS to a user for participating in an event
Remove 50 GEMS from a user as a penalty
View total GEMS in circulation, top earners, and other statistics

notes: Use sparingly to maintain economy balance
Always include a clear reason for transparency

commands.name: roadmap-admin
usage: /roadmap-admin update phase_id status - Update roadmap phase status
/roadmap-admin refresh - Refresh roadmap data from source

examples.description: Mark Phase 1 as completed in the roadmap
Refresh roadmap data and update Discord channels

notes: Updates are reflected in roadmap channels
Use refresh after manual roadmap file changes
